comments: This game stinks. Only way I can see to login is to be on Facebook. Which I refuse to do. Facebook sucks and so does this game. Uninstalling. Goodbye.

I actually really like this game, graphics are beautiful and the concept is fun... problem is, I've had it a week and been in the game 4x. It doesn't load... like ever. I've restarted my phone, uninstalled and installed and nothing. It just sits on the opening screen, sadly I will have to delete. Wish I didn't have to but it's just wasting space on my phone now. Otherwise, I did enjoy it.

Its completely pay to play. You have to use diamonds to expand your land, but you can't earn them. You have to buy them with real money. It would be a problem if you could buy a small amount for like $0.99... But the minimum is $10 Its ridiculous.

I would love the game,if there was really something to do, no interaction,from what I've read this is a useless app.i got on after the update today,and my screen is blank except for my buildings,the scenery is gone,black! I am on a mobile and can't use any of the great functions everyone talks about. I can't even help my team,totally disappointed,that's for sure. And I've spent quite a bit of money. I am so bored.Theres only a couple things to enjoy on it.Come on ,why can't you get this game together for Android users?

Playing on the phone app. I am disappointed that I cannot play the full version. I cannot send messages to my fellowship members, I cannot see their cities, I cannot participate in the events with my teammates. All I am doing all day every day is trying to build up resources for upgrades, and those are high compared with how much you can make. You cannot earm free diamonds, and many of the buildings you cannot get without them. Will rate higher when these things are improved.

The game is beautiful, but its a bit to complicated. And the in app purchases are rediculus. I'd love it if you could actually advance in the games. There are just too many things needed to advance in the slightest. It's too bad cuz the game it has great graphics.
description: BUILD THE CITY OF YOUR DREAMS IN MAGICAL ELVENARChoose between elves and humans to build a beautiful, fantasy city. Discover a world of magic and mystery as you constantly build, develop and expand your realm. You decide how to advance your city as you gather resources, trade with other players and research ancient technologies. Whether you want to build a whimsical paradise or a well-organized metropolis, it’s easy to create a home for fantasy creatures and enjoy the detailed beauty of Elvenar.CHOOSE YOUR RACEPlay as powerful humans or magical elves to build as you see fitSTART INSTANTLYCity building is quick and easy with a friendly introduction and active communityEXPLORE THE WORLDDiscover new provinces to expand your cityTRADE WITH FRIENDSTrade goods and resources with fellow players and merchants in the marketplaceADVANCE YOUR CIVILIZATIONUpgrade your buildings to supply your growing populationWELCOME NEW CREATURESCreate a home for dwarves, fairies, dragons and other charming fantasy racesElvenar is based on the successful browser city-builder, published by InnoGames. Now players can enjoy the online fantasy fun on mobile, tablet and PC browser – all from the same account. Elvenar is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. A network connection is also required.Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/imprint
descriptionHTML:
BUILD THE CITY OF YOUR DREAMS IN MAGICAL ELVENAR

Choose between elves and humans to build a beautiful, fantasy city. Discover a world of magic and mystery as you constantly build, develop and expand your realm. You decide how to advance your city as you gather resources, trade with other players and research ancient technologies. Whether you want to build a whimsical paradise or a well-organized metropolis, it’s easy to create a home for fantasy creatures and enjoy the detailed beauty of Elvenar.

CHOOSE YOUR RACE
Play as powerful humans or magical elves to build as you see fit

START INSTANTLY
City building is quick and easy with a friendly introduction and active community

EXPLORE THE WORLD
Discover new provinces to expand your city

TRADE WITH FRIENDS
Trade goods and resources with fellow players and merchants in the marketplace

ADVANCE YOUR CIVILIZATION
Upgrade your buildings to supply your growing population

WELCOME NEW CREATURES
Create a home for dwarves, fairies, dragons and other charming fantasy races

Elvenar is based on the successful browser city-builder, published by InnoGames. Now players can enjoy the online fantasy fun on mobile, tablet and PC browser – all from the same account.

Elvenar is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/imprint
recentChanges: Our Easter Event The Phoenix Cult is available! Log in now and get some great new and unique buildings for your city!
With this Event, a new type of building is introduced: the Wishing Well. This building will regularly grant you a random resource, including Diamonds!
You can now use the Enchantments you produced in the Magic Academy!
summary: Create a flourishing fantasy city and discover a magical world full of mysteries
title: Elvenar

description: Play a soccer match at the beach under the sun. Shoot balls to the goal avoiding the goalkeeper or the obstacles. Multiply your score passing the ball through the rings or hitting the poles. In the very first levels the goalkeeper is a noob but as you pass levels it will get harder to score goals. Be ready to challenge yourself against other player in the tournament and you will get a cup fragment. When you complete the cup you will start the second road to another soccer cup.Play in career mode, in which you will have to win the beach soccer championship, with over 150 levels that will force you to show that you are the best soccer player, and the best in free kicks and penalties. In this soccer game, you also have a new soccer mode of challenges, in which you must complete some soccer challenges and get the victory to get a great reward, show that you are capable of achieving them and become the best soccer player of history!In this soccer game:★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Show your skills shooting goals from the penalty point.★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Avoid the players wall to score like the best football players in the world.★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Compete in the beach soccer league and get all the cup fragments.★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Take down all the boxes in a funny game mode.★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Enhance your player skills like ball effect, power or accuracy.Shoot Goal Beach Soccer 2018 is the best beach soccer game! This game is completely free but you can make some purchases to level up your player skills or game assets. 2018 Bambo Studio
descriptionHTML:
Play a soccer match at the beach under the sun. Shoot balls to the goal avoiding the goalkeeper or the obstacles. Multiply your score passing the ball through the rings or hitting the poles. In the very first levels the goalkeeper is a noob but as you pass levels it will get harder to score goals. Be ready to challenge yourself against other player in the tournament and you will get a cup fragment. When you complete the cup you will start the second road to another soccer cup.

Play in career mode, in which you will have to win the beach soccer championship, with over 150 levels that will force you to show that you are the best soccer player, and the best in free kicks and penalties. In this soccer game, you also have a new soccer mode of challenges, in which you must complete some soccer challenges and get the victory to get a great reward, show that you are capable of achieving them and become the best soccer player of history!

In this soccer game:

★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Show your skills shooting goals from the penalty point.
★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Avoid the players wall to score like the best football players in the world.
★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Compete in the beach soccer league and get all the cup fragments.
★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Take down all the boxes in a funny game mode.
★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Enhance your player skills like ball effect, power or accuracy.

Shoot Goal Beach Soccer 2018 is the best beach soccer game! This game is completely free but you can make some purchases to level up your player skills or game assets.

2018 Bambo Studio

description: Welcome to the Ski Resort Village. Start your Vacation Today! Drive and park a huge roster of winter vehicles around the charming snow-covered ski village.Features:▶ DISCOVER A PICTURESQUE TOURIST DESTINATION - mountain roads, hotels, ice skate rinks, ski slopes and slaloms!▶ 15 COOL CARS - snow plows, road gritter truck, buses, 4x4 pickup trucks, a snowmobile bike and more!▶ 75 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - prove your skills in precision driving and parking▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROL METHODS - choose one that suits your style!▶ 100% FREE TO PLAY - all the way through, no strings attached!Ski Resort Parking Simulator is a unique driving game, that will help you feel the charm of the winter season. Drive cars and other varied vehicles in the snow, beholding the magnificent view. Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the Ski Resort Village. Start your Vacation Today! Drive and park a huge roster of winter vehicles around the charming snow-covered ski village.

Features:
▶ DISCOVER A PICTURESQUE TOURIST DESTINATION - mountain roads, hotels, ice skate rinks, ski slopes and slaloms!
▶ 15 COOL CARS - snow plows, road gritter truck, buses, 4x4 pickup trucks, a snowmobile bike and more!
▶ 75 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - prove your skills in precision driving and parking
▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROL METHODS - choose one that suits your style!
▶ 100% FREE TO PLAY - all the way through, no strings attached!

Ski Resort Parking Simulator is a unique driving game, that will help you feel the charm of the winter season. Drive cars and other varied vehicles in the snow, beholding the magnificent view. Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.

Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.

Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!
